analysis.description:
DTF.transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#158-175) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-knc.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#168-169)
	-omg.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#169-173)

Reentrancy in DTF.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#218-239):
	External calls:
	- (kncExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,knc,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#220)
	- (omgExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,omg,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#221-222)
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#224-227)
	- omgCount = kyber.trade.value(omgCost)(ieth,omgCost,omg,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#228-231)
	External calls sending eth:
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#224-227)
	- omgCount = kyber.trade.value(omgCost)(ieth,omgCost,omg,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#228-231)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalSupply (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#237-238)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#236-237)

Reentrancy in DTF.transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#158-175):
	External calls:
	- knc.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#168-169)
	- omg.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#169-173)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalSupply (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#173)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x79427f229b2d3847eae9a00f1496e85a045fd410.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
